title: Download the latest episode of The Independent Football Podcast
text:
This week on the Indy Football Podcast, we discuss Manchester United’s start to the season.

Host Luke Brown is joined by Chief Football Writer Miguel Delaney, Northern Football Correspondent Mark Critchley and Sports Reporter Lawrence Ostlere.

They discuss United’s 1-1 draw with Liverpool over the weekend: was it the club’s finest performance of the season?

We’ll tell you what’s true. You can form your own view. From 15p €0.18 $0.18 USD 0.27 a day, more exclusives, analysis and extras.

The team also discuss Ole Gunnar Solskjaer’s tactical nous and his inspired decision to play three at the back against league leaders Liverpool.

There is also enough time for a discussion on controversial executive vice-chairman Ed Woodward. Did he sell Solskjaer short this summer? Or is he misunderstood?

As ever, follow us on Twitter, Facebook and Instagram to stay up to date with the latest football news.

Click play above to listen to the latest episode, which is also available on iTunes, acast and all other podcast providers (if the audio is not appearing on your mobile, you may need to view on desktop or download the podcast).
